EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Draconic Studies
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are centered, you can use your Wisdom modifier to hit. You are centered with one-handed Clubs and Sceptres. Each core ability in this tree grants you +3 Melee Power, +3 Universal Spell Power, and +3 Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Way of the Mighty Dragon I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Like a Dragon, your power is undeniable. You gain +2 to your Spellcraft skill and +2 to Attack. At Dragon Disciple levels 9 and 15 these bonuses increase by +1. While you are Centered, you can use your Wisdom modifier to damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Way of the Mighty Dragon II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Way of the Mighty Dragon now includes +2% Doublestrike. At Dragon Disciple levels 9 and 15 this bonus increases by +1%. You gain True Seeing.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Fist of the Dragon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Centered Melee Attack: Channel Draconic strength and the power of your weapons into your fist, hitting a single target with +50% Damage. If you have a Power in Practice Imbue enabled, you deal 1d4 damage per Character Level of that imbue's element. This scales with 100% Spell Power. Cooldown: 12 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Way of the Mighty Dragon III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Way of the Mighty Dragon now includes +3 Critical Confirmation and Critical Damage and +3 Imbue Dice. +5 Maximum Caster Level with Lesser Draconic Burst.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Draconic Apotheosis
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: On Activation: For 20 seconds, you take 50% less damage from Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison, gain +2 to all Ability Scores, immunity to Sleep and Paralysis, +1 Critical Multiplier on a 19-20, +5% Spell Critical Damage, and Acolyte's Breath and Devastation both deal double damage. Cost: 100 Ki. Cooldown: 2 minutes. Passive: +4 Wisdom, +3 Imbue Dice, +12 Melee Power, and +12 Universal Spell Power. +10 Maximum Caster Level with Lesser Draconic Burst and Draconic Burst.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Lesser Draconic Burst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain five SLAs, each in one of the Draconic elements (Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison), which all share a single cooldown. You channel Ki to bring forth your Dragon's element in a small burst, hitting all enemies very close to you. Deals 1d6+1 [element] damage per caster level (max 5d6+5 at caster level 5). A successful Reflex save reduces damage by half, DC 10 + WIS mod + Evocation bonuses (Acid uses Conjuration) + Breath Weapon bonuses. 4 second cooldown, costs 5 Ki, must be Centered to use.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Power in Practice
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Taking this enhancement grants you five Imbue Toggles, in Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid and Poison. Imbue Toggle: While you are Centered, your Draconic Studies embolden your weapon strikes, which deal 1d6 damage of the relevant element on each hit. This damage scales with 100% of the relevant Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Power in Practice: Acid
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: While you are Centered, your Draconic Studies embolden your weapon strikes, which deal 1d6 Acid damage on each hit. This damage scales with 100% of the Acid Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Power in Practice: Electric
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: While you are Centered, your Draconic Studies embolden your weapon strikes, which deal 1d6 Electric damage on each hit. This damage scales with 100% of the Electric Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Power in Practice: Fire
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: While you are Centered, your Draconic Studies embolden your weapon strikes, which deal 1d6 Fire damage on each hit. This damage scales with 100% of the Fire Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Power in Practice: Ice
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: While you are Centered, your Draconic Studies embolden your weapon strikes, which deal 1d6 Cold damage on each hit. This damage scales with 100% of the Cold Spell Power.

Stance.Name: Power in Practice: Poison
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: While you are Centered, your Draconic Studies embolden your weapon strikes, which deal 1d6 Poison damage on each hit. This damage scales with 100% of the Poison Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Study of Scales
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Fortitude Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Draconic Devotion I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Centered, you gain +8 Universal Spell Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Heart of the Dragon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Spellcraft, Heal, and Listen. Rank 3: +3 Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Acolyte's Breath
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Taking this enhancement grants you five SLAs, in Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison. All five share a single cooldown. Centered Ki Breath Attack SLA: You channel Ki to bring forth Draconic power in a small burst, hitting all enemies very close to you. Deals 1d6+3 damage of the relevant element per caster level. A successful Reflex save reduces damage by half. DC 10 + WIS mod + (Evocation, Conjuration, Transmutation depending on element) + Breath Weapon bonuses.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Power Begets Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your melee strikes with weapons generate +2 Ki.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Discipleship I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 Imbue Dice.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Innate Arcana
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your studies have increased your maximum Spell Points by +[30/60/90].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Action Boost: Doublestrike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to Doublestrike for 20 seconds. Usable 5 times per rest. Cooldown: 30 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Draconic Burst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Taking this enhancement grants you five SLAs, in Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison. All five share a single cooldown. Centered Ki Breath Attack SLA: You channel Ki to bring forth your Dragon's element in a small burst, hitting all enemies close to you. Deals 1d6+3 damage of the relevant element per caster level. A successful Reflex save reduces damage by half, DC 10 + WIS mod + (Evocation, Conjuration or Transmutation) bonuses + Breath Weapon bonuses.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Way of the Dragon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Way based on your choice of Light or Dark Monk Path.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Channel the Enlightened Dragon
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: You and nearby allies become immune to Daze, Stun, and Sleep for 60 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds. Cost: 10 Ki

Requirement.Item: Path of Harmonious Balance: Fists of Light

EnhancementSelection.Name: Channel the Raging Dragon
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate: Nearby allies gain a +2 Untyped bonus to Attack, Saving Throws, and Skills for 60 seconds. Cooldown: 90 seconds Cost: 10 Ki

Requirement.Item: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Clear Your Mind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Battle Trance: While Centered, you gain an Insight bonus to Attack, Damage and the DCs of Tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Wisdom modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. Cooldown: 20 seconds. Activation Cost: 35 Ki. The effects of this Trance are dispelled if you are no longer Centered. Antirequisite: This ability can not be trained if you have any other Battle Trance ability (e.g. Know the Angles).

Stance.Name: Clear Your Mind

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Draconic Devotion II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Centered, +8 Universal Spell Power and +1% Universal Spell Critical Chance. Your Breath Attacks apply Shaken to affected enemies for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select +1 to one Ability Score.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Secret Power
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Lesser Draconic Bursts now apply 2 stacks of Vulnerability to affected targets. Your Draconic Bursts now apply a stack of Weakened Will, Feeble Fortitude, and Reduced Reflexes to affected targets.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Tranquility in Strife
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an aspect of the Dragon that will unlock new Melee Weapons you can be Centered with.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dragon's Claw
EnhancementSelection.Description: You are now Centered with Handaxe, Battle Axe, and Sickle.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dragon's Tail
EnhancementSelection.Description: You are now Centered with Light Hammer and Warhammer.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dragon's Tooth
EnhancementSelection.Description: You are now Centered with Light and Heavy Pick.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Discipleship II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 Imbue Die and +3 to Breath Weapon DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Draconic Devotion III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Centered, +8 Universal Spell Power and +2% Universal Spell Critical Chance.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select +1 to one Ability Score.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Draconic Devastation
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Taking this enhancement grants you file SLAs, in Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison. All five share a single cooldown. Centered Ki Breath Attack SLA: Cone that deals 1d6+6 damage of the relevant element per caster level. A successful Reflex save reduces damage by half, DC 10 + WIS mod + (Evocation, Conjuration or Transmutation depending on element) bonuses + Breath Weapon bonuses. Affected enemies who are Shaken become Afraid and have their movement speed reduced by 90% for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Peace in Destruction
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Centered, you gain +1 Competence Bonus to Critical Threat Range and Critical Multiplier. Passive: You gain a +25% Competence bonus to Maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Perfect Disciple
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +2 Breath Weapon DCs and +2 Evocation, Conjuration, and Transmutation DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Shining Scales
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +30 MRR cap.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Disciple: Perfect Breathing
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +4% Universal Spell Critical Chance. Your Acolyte's Breath and Draconic Devastation have their cooldown reduced by 33%.
